gobblin.source

Class PartitionedFileSourceBase<SCHEMA,DATA>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.AbstractSource<S,D>
      • gobblin.source.extractor.filebased.FileBasedSource<SCHEMA,DATA>
        • gobblin.source.PartitionedFileSourceBase<SCHEMA,DATA>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source<SCHEMA,DATA>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatePartitionedAvroFileSource, RegexPartitionedAvroFileSource

    public abstract class PartitionedFileSourceBase<SCHEMA,DATA>
extends FileBasedSource<SCHEMA,DATA>
    Implementation of Source that reads over date-partitioned files. This source can be regarded as the reader equivalent of TimeBasedAvroWriterPartitioner.

    The class will iterate through all the data folders given by the base directory ConfigurationKeys.SOURCE_FILEBASED_DATA_DIRECTORY. It relies on a PartitionAwareFileRetriever to actually retrieve the files in a given partition.

      • getWorkunits

        public List<WorkUnit> getWorkunits(SourceState state)
        Description copied from class: FileBasedSource
        This method takes the snapshot seen in the previous run, and compares it to the list of files currently in the source - it then decided which files it needs to pull and distributes those files across the workunits; it does this comparison by comparing the names of the files currently in the source vs. the names retrieved from the previous state
        Specified by:
        getWorkunits in interface Source<SCHEMA,DATA>
        Overrides:
        getWorkunits in class FileBasedSource<SCHEMA,DATA>
        Parameters:
        state - is the source state
        Returns:
        a list of workunits for the framework to run
